# Project 2: COMPASS Research Poster

## Required Files

Place the following files in this folder:

- **image1.png** - Preview image of the research poster (screenshot or photo)
- **poster.pdf** - The complete research poster PDF file for download

## File Usage

- **image1.png**:
  - Preview image in the project carousel
  - Gallery image when users click "Gallery" button

- **poster.pdf**:
  - Downloads when users click "Visit" button
  - Full resolution poster for viewing/printing

## Recommended Image Specifications

For **image1.png**:
- **Format**: PNG or JPG
- **Aspect Ratio**: Match your poster aspect ratio (typically portrait)
- **Resolution**: At least 1200 pixels wide
- **Content**: Full poster or key sections showcase

## Project Details

- **Project**: COMPASS - Robust Imitation Learning from Imperfect Demonstrations
- **Presented at**: Robot Learning 2025 Poster Fair, Seoul National University
